text: How to Murder Your Wife is a 1965 American black comedy movie directed by Richard Quine and starring Jack Lemmon, Virna Lisi, Terry-Thomas, Claire Trevor, Eddie Mayehoff, Jack Albertson. It was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1965 comedy movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Richard Quine
title: How to Murder Your Wife
